resources.string: This activity displays the song which is playing presently. Here, we also have the option to play, pause, forward, rewind the song.
This activity displays the playlist of the songs. There can be a number of playlists.
This activity display the various albums of the songs. By clicking on the album, we can have the songs associated to that album.
This activity display the number of songs we are having on our device.
This activity displays the settings of the app. We can change settings from here, like Equilizer settings etc.
